title: Workday
description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Workday Source.

orgs_to_keep.title: Orgs To Keep
orgs_to_keep.description: Teams belonging to these orgs will be kept

orgs_to_ignore.title: Orgs To Ignore
orgs_to_ignore.description: The teams belonging to these orgs will be ignored.

fail_on_cycles.title: Fail On Cycles
fail_on_cycles.description: If true, the sync will fail if there are cycles in the org chart.

include_cycle_teams.title: Include Cycle Teams
include_cycle_teams.description: If true, the sync will include teams that are part of a cycle.
